title: smashed cucumbers
ingredients: 2 seedless cucumbers; about 1 to 1 1/2 lbs; the english cucumbers work well here
1-2 tsp chili oil; I love momofuku chili crunch for this
instructions: Trim ends off of cucumber(s) and cut into 4–5" segments if long. Use the butt of a chef's knife to break the cucumber into pieces. It should result in 3–4 lengthwise sections.  Remove any pulp that was squished out and cut the segments on a bias in 1/4–1/2" slices.
Toss cucumbers with all other ingredients and let marinate for 10 minutes if possible.  If done ahead of time, keep in the fridge until 20–30 minutes before serving.
